name: Open Humans Data Uploader
description: A web app to support data uploads to an Open Humans project

HEROKUCONFIG_APP_NAME.description: Heroku "App name" (copy/paste what you set above)

OH_CLIENT_ID.description: Needs to be set to connect to a project you created in Open Humans.

OH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Needs to be set to connect to a project you created in Open Humans.

SECRET_KEY.description: This is set for you and is used to encrypt data.
